text: Hontōni safā to Maruwa wa, arrā no seiseki no nakadearu. Dakara seiden ni junrei suru mono, matawa (ko junrei no tame ni sore o) otozureru mono wa, kono ryō oka o tafūfu (kai-jun) shite mo tsumide wanai. Susunde yoi okonai o suru mono ni wa, hontōni arrā wa yomishi, sore o yoku o mitome kudasaru
